metadata.Title: CVE-2004-0630

Platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T

metadata.Description: The uudecoding feature in Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0.5 and 5.0.6 for Unix and Linux, and possibly other versions including those before 5.0.9, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via shell metacharacters ("`" or backtick) in the filename of the PDF file that is provided to the uudecode command.
